ComicInfo.Series: Citizen V and the V-Battalion: The Everlasting
ComicInfo.Summary: Marvel's First Hero Appears! Gods walk the Earth! Nations are fractured by civil war! Plus: a solution that has never been seen before in a Marvel Comic and by now can officially be called "A Patented Citizen V Twist!"
